title: Implementation of Mangrove Conservation projects through donations from the Commonwealth Blue Charter Project Incubator
decision_details: - In 2023, the Commonwealth Blue Charter Project Incubator has called for project proposals from Commonwealth countries to provide grants for the mangrove conservation. Two (02) project proposals submitted by Sri Lanka for this purpose have been selected by the Commonwealth Blue Charter Project Incubator. Accordingly, that institution has decided to grant donations for the Project of preliminary mangrove carbon stock assessments for Sri Lanka and the Project on a study on faunal pioneers to restore mangroves and mapping sea grass mangrove interphases using satellite and drone technology. The proposal made by the Minister of Wildlife and Forest Resources Conservation to implement the above projects through the Department of Wildlife Conservation and the Department of Forest Conservation under the supervision of the Ministry of Wildlife and Forest Resources Conservation and enter into relevant agreements accordingly, was approved by the Cabinet.
